title: How Good is Improved Processing for Abbasids?
creator: Age of Noob
description: Improved Processing is an Imperial Age unique technology for The Abbasid Dynasty in Age of Empires 4, so let's explore how good it is!

youtube_data.title: How Good is Improved Processing for Abbasids?

title: When should you research Enclosures for The English?
creator: Age of Noob
description: Enclosures is an Imperial Age unique technology for The English in Age of Empires 4, and it's fantastic. Let's explore why!

youtube_data.title: When should you research Enclosures for The English?

title: When should you research Wheelbarrow?
creator: Age of Noob
description: We explore one of the most useful economy technologies in Age of Empires 4: Wheelbarrow! Exactly when should we pick it up though? Let's find out!

youtube_data.title: When should you research Wheelbarrow? (AoE4)

title: When should you get Food Upgrades?
creator: Age of Noob
description: Food is the backbone of your economy in Age of Empires 4, so let's explore the optimal times on when you should research Horticulture, Fertilization, and Precision Cross Breeding from the Mill!

youtube_data.title: When Should You Get Food Upgrades? (AoE4)

title: Should you get the new Survival Techniques?
creator: Age of Noob
description: The Season One update in Age of Empires 4 has introduced many changes, one of which is to hunting. Survival Techniques has thus changed significantly, so let's explore how good it is in the current patch!

youtube_data.title: Should you get the new Survival Techniques?

title: When should you research Mining Techs?
creator: Age of Noob
description: Mining technologies in the Age of Empires franchise don't get much love, and for good reason. Are Specialized Pick, Acid Distillation, and Cupellation in Age of Empires 4 any different though? Let's find out!

youtube_data.title: When Should You Research Mining Techs?

title: Prelates Deep Dive for Economy!
creator: Age of Noob
description: The Prelates of the Holy Roman Empire add a lot of economic as well as military mechanics to the civilization in Age of Empires IV — but how good are Prelates at boosting your economy? Let's find out!

youtube_data.title: Prelates Deep Dive for Economy!

title: When are extra Mining Camps Worth it?
creator: Age of Noob
description: Just like lumber camp refreshing, adding additional mining camps for both gold and stone collection increases the efficiency of your miners. That said, when is it worth it to build said additional mining camps, and does Wheelbarrow and Specialized Pick affect this? Let's find out!

youtube_data.title: When are extra Mining Camps Worth It?

title: When should you research Wood upgrades?
creator: Age of Noob
description: We revisit the efficiency of wood collection in Age of Empires 4 — this time, we investigate all wood upgrades in the Lumber Camp; namely Forestry, Double Broadax, Wheelbarrow, Lumber Preservation, and Crosscut Saw!

youtube_data.title: When Should You Research Wood Upgrades?

title: When should you Optimally Refresh Lumber Camps?
creator: Age of Noob
description: We get into the forest of Age of Empires 4 economy - this time with the age old question of when is the optimal time for you to refresh your lumber camps for the most optimal wood collection! Be sure to use the collection rates and payback times here in your gameplay!

youtube_data.title: When Should You Optimally Refresh Lumber Camps?

title: An In-Depth Analysis of the Fire Lancers!
creator: Age of Noob
description: The Chinese Fire Lancers are one of the most unique units in Age of Empires 4. They are available in the Castle Age once the player achieves the Yuan Dynasty. They have, however, raised some concerns about their design and balance, so here's an exploration of the unit's stats, matchups, strengths, and weaknesses. Enjoy!

youtube_data.title: An In-Depth Analysis of the Fire Lancers!

title: The Choice of Landsknechts over Man-at-Arms!
creator: Age of Noob
description: Landsknechts are Holy Roman Empire's unique unit that can be trained in the Castle Age. How good are they in Age of Empires 4? And why should you pick them over the already-great HRE Man-at-Arms? Let's find out!

youtube_data.title: The Choice of Landsknechts over Man-at-Arms!

title: Can Elephants Garrison Outposts in AoE4?
creator: Age of Noob
description: Age of Empires has always had silly mechanics when it comes to garrisoning units in buildings or other units. How does Age of Empires 4 differ from the series? Let's find out!

title: New Housed Mechanic in AoE4
creator: Age of Noob
description: Being housed in Age of Empires 4 works slightly differently than in Age of Empires 2 - but this minor tweak has sizeable implications to how the game is played. Enjoy!

youtube_data.title: New Housed Mechanic in AoE4!

title: Wild Boars in Age of Empires IV!

title: Rus Age 2 Tower Rush Breakdown
creator: AnMagicalCow
description: Rus is maybe not the first civilization you think of when you hear "Tower Rush". With a more expensive tower aswell as their heavy reliance on wood. However, with textiles, 8 villagers and their hammers, and a greedy opponent; A well place tower can easily make them GG early. Lets learn how!
